titleStmt.title: A compendium of the vertues, operations, and use of that applauded antipancronicon called Nendicks--popular--pill delivered in a plain and easie method, whereby the different causes, symptoms, and dangers of all chronick and reigning diseases as scurvy, spleen, setled humours, and foulness of bloud, are truly discovered ... / prepared only by Dr. Nendick, and published for publique benefit ...
titleStmt.author: Nendick, Humphrey.

titleStmt.title: A compendium of the vertues, operations, and use of that applauded antipancronicon called Nendicks--popular--pill delivered in a plain and easie method, whereby the different causes, symptoms, and dangers of all chronick and reigning diseases as scurvy, spleen, setled humours, and foulness of bloud, are truly discovered ... / prepared only by Dr. Nendick, and published for publique benefit ...
titleStmt.author: Nendick, Humphrey.
